column1: length ball on off, punched to cover
drifts in a length ball, punched to mid-off
works this back to the bowler off the backfoot
goes fuller, gets this to skid through, Hope plays back when he should've been forward. Squirted back
first runs for the game, slips this down leg, Hope misses as he looks to tickle it behind
works it down past midwicket to get off the mark
squeezed off a thick inside edge to square leg, lazy effort from the infielders. Ball-watching without chasing it. Should've been no more than a single
delightfully flicked to the square leg fence! Half-volley on the pads and Hope says thanks very much
glorious cover drive! Just leant forward and caressed that to bisect cover and mid-off
width again, crashed straight to cover point
hits the hard lengths, gets some late inward movement and bounce, Hope gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
good length outside off, hardly any bounce this time, left alone
touch fuller, invites the drive, Hope lets it go
skids one back in, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as this rolls to the off side
pushed into the covers
squirted into the off side. Bowled full from around the stumps
too short, Lewis plays the short-arm jab to deep square
beauty! Deceived by the back-of-the-hand carrom ball that beats the inside edge
works this into the gap at midwicket
slips this length delivery down leg, good grab by the wicketkeeper
lovely on-drive but straight to mid-on
short of length delivery flirting with the wide line, left alone
crashed on the up to the cover boundary. Tracer bullet stuff. Naveen struggling with his line and length
slips this too far outside off, Hope cuts and misses. Wide called and rightly so
that's a good delivery. Nips back in off a length from outside off, balloons up off an inside-edge but doesn't carry to the bowler on his followthrough
tickled away, no fine leg. Races away. This is very poor bowling
nicely driven, good stop at extra cover
defended back to the bowler
pushed into the off side
defended back to the bowler off the backfoot
beats short fine! Drifting into the pads and swept well
pushed to short midwicket
drilled through the off side, Ahmadi at wide long-off runs around to cut that off
nice drift, straightens to hit him on the pad but this was sliding down
nicely tossed up, he gets well forward and smothers the spin
punched to extra cover
lunges forward and jabs it away
looks to whip it square but is hit on the thigh pad as this skids through
no room, forces this straight to point. Maiden to begin
pushed back
pushed into the covers this time
squirted past slip off a thick outside edge
drifts in to roll off a thick inside edge to square leg, Hope played down the wrong line
drifting down and he's swept this fine to beat short fine. Came off an under-edge, may haven't been where he intended but it doesn't matter
defended into the off side
tossed up outside off, he gets well forward and defends back
played back to the bowler
pushed back off the backfoot to Nabi
slapped to cover, looked to make room but this one spun back in to cramp him
no timing as he tries to force this through cover
leading edge that rolls to cover, maiden over
defended towards point
sharp turn from length on middle, pushed back
pulled away into the gap at deep square. Too short and Lewis picked the length early
gets well forward and defends
another pull, but straight to square leg this time
better length, much fuller, defended back
steps out but can't get to the pitch, turns it to short midwicket
worked with the spin to midwicket
uppish but turned wide of midwicket for a single
drifting down leg and he's powered this sweep past short fine
looks to cut but there's no room, bunted away
width on offer, but he lets it go even after shaping to cut
pushed into the covers off the frontfoot
turned gently to the leg side
looks to play the half-pull but he slips this down leg, wide called
appeal for lbw as he plays outside the line but the sharp turn may have taken it down leg. Height in question too
uppish sweep wide of short fine
driven with the spin to extra cover
slaps this straight to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
nicely tossed up outside off, Lewis lets it go
punched to sweeper cover
punched to short midwicket
sharp turn to beat the inside edge and lob off the thigh pad
tucked wide of square leg to bring up the fifty
swept uppishly but lands short of short fine
drilled through the gap, threads the needle of sorts at extra cover. Two men inside the ring, bisected both. Too full and he powered this way. Lovely to watch
uppish but lands wide of cover. Didn't get to the pitch, good bowling as he got him to drive again
huge mix-up, Lewis called and then stopped, Hope was down the pitch a long way, had to run back and put in a dive to avert the possibility of being stranded out
goes right back and defends
gets well forward and blocks
quicker length ball on the stumps, defended back
punched back to the bowler
tucked between square leg and midwicket
sharp turn, plenty of grip, Lewis check-punches
squared up but he's right behind the line in defence
slapped away, good stop at cover
swept straight to short fine
width, punched to deep point
nice and full outside off, pushed into the covers
forceful Pujara like push to sweeper cover
gets it high on the bat as he tries to pull, rolls past square leg
way too early into the pull, beaten
nice and full outside off, left alone
chipped in the air, but just wide of point
turns this with the spin to deep midwicket
skids one through from length on middle, defended back
tossed up a touch wide, there for the drive but Lewis leaves as he didn't get to the pitch
punched wide of cover
gets well forward and smothers this
superb bouncer, hustled Lewis for pace, ball deflects off the shoulder
bunted gently to point
width and he's slashed that away, square third man runs around to stop. Well done, Asghar Afghan
slower and fuller outside off, smeared into the gap at sweeper cover, they take one for the throw
pulled all along the ground to deep square
misfield at point and they'll get a couple
works this to midwicket
squirted wide of point
defended back to the bowler
beauty! Beaten on the drive as he's drawn forward
goes right back into the crease as he defends back
helped along to beat short fine. Think that should be a boundary even though Ahmadi ran after it and thought he pulled it back. His knee got stuck into the turf, so he lost balance. Poor delivery
gets well forward and defends back
fizzy length ball, defended back
beaten for pace, toe-ends the pull to midwicket
edged, races past slip and short third man. Lon chase, neatly done by Najibullah to pull it back
punched back, down to short mid-on
accounts for the turn and defends back
length on off, punched to sweeper's left off the back foot
full outside off, shuffles and laps this straight to short fine
length on middle stump, looks for the sweep again but forced to stay on his feet and awkwardly run this to short fine with an angled bat
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, toe-ended cut to extra cover
length on off stump, defended to point off the outside half
full at a leg stump line. Wants to paddle that and cops it on the front leg. Leg stump is slightly visible as this happens and a loud appeal for lbw is turned down. Did that pitch in line? Very close
length on middle, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length on middle stump, mistimed pull to deep midwicket's right
full on middle stump, hurriedly sweeps at this and manages to get it fine of the short fine leg fielder off the inside half
length at off stump, pushed into the covers
length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
length outside off, defended to point on the front foot
pumps it straight over the bowler! This is tossed up at a length outside off. He jumps down to the pitch of it and gets a lot of this off the middle
tossed up on leg stump, cops it on the pad as he looks to sweep
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
big appeal for lbw turned down. Might have been going down leg side. Short of a length slider traps him on the back foot as he looks to flick
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length on off stump, defended to point
short of a length on middle, pulled to deep square's right off the inside half
googly, length ball outside off. Hurriedly defended on the front foot
slider at a length on middle, nudged to midwicket off the back foot
slower ball at a length on off stump, defended on the front foot
slower ball again. Cutting away from a length outside off. Looks to chop that and is beaten
slower bouncer. At an off stump line. He looks to play the hook and is beaten
length ball outside off, shuffles and leaves that alone
slower ball at a length outside off, looks to punch through the covers. Gets an inside edge into his body and it rolls past leg stump
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length on off stump, gets forward and jabs this through cover to bring up his fifty. That's his seventh one in ODIs
length on off stump, defended to midwicket on the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot

given lbw! Hope doesn't pick the googly. It's short of a length and ripping in from outside off stump. He's swishing at this, trying to flick a ball that goes straight on. It's a long way away from the inside edge and traps him in front of middle and off
short of a length outside off, crunched to sweeper's right off the back foot
short of a length outside off, cut to backward point
length and into middle stump, flicked to deep square
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
bisects short third and backward point. Short of a length slider outside off, opens the face very late and forces Rashid to chase and pull that back in with a slide
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper's left
smashes leg stump. A full fast delivery. Flicking length, but Lewis has looked to sweep. And has got into a tangle, swatting at that hurriedly. Bowled around his legs and the bowling change works
beaten. Googly at a length just outside off. Pushes away from the body and that's past his outside edge
short of a length and zipping in off the surface as he makes room and hurriedly cuts into the covers
googly at a length, wide outside off. Pushes way from the body and defends with one hand off the bat. Inside half. He didn't pick that
googly at a length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, defended into the off side
lbw appeal as he's trapped deep in the crease trying to flick. But this googly is going down leg side
length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's right and Nabi sprints and dives to stop the single
short of a length and spinning into the pads. Flicked to short fine
full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, cut firmly to sweeper cover
length at the stumps, punched down the pitch off the back foot
length outside off, leans in and drives to mid-off
short and just outside off, punched firmly to extra cover
short of a length and turning in from outside off. Looks to cut and is beaten
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper's left
length on off stump, flicked to deep midwicket
full on the pads, looks to flick and cops it on the pad
short of a length on middle, punched to mid-on off the back foot
length on middle stump, gets forward, drops this into the off side with soft hands
length ball outside off, driven with the turn to long-on
short of a length and in at off stump. Makes room and chops to point
lifted over midwicket. Dropped short and in at the stumps. Gets deep and gets this off the toe-end of the bat as he pulls
full on off stump, closes the face with a flick and gets a thick edge into the covers
short of a length and sliding in to cramp him on the flick. He cops it on the body
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper
googly, short of a length on middle stump. Flicked to midwicket off the back foot
length on off stump, pushed into the covers with soft hands
length on middle stump, whipped to midwicket off the back foot
short and just outside off, punched to extra cover's right and a big diving stop there to keep it to a dot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length on off stump, defended to point on the front foot
short and wide outside off. Sits up nicely as he backs into the leg side and he slaps this behind backward point
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right and forces a slide from Zazai out there
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
floated up on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
length on leg stump, flicked through midwicket with soft hands
oh lovely. Chase caresses this cover drive to perfection between deep cover and long-off. To the pitch of that length ball nicely and a sweet flow of the arms to get just enough power on this
length on off, defended into the off side
length and turning in at middle stump. Closes the face and drops this into the leg side with soft hands
length ball curving away after pitching. He swishes away from the body and is beaten
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
length on off stump, defended into the off side
short of a length on off, backs away and cuts to point
length on leg stump, looks to flick and cops it on the pad
length on off, punched to extra cover off the back fooot
Rashid flies to his left, leading with his right hand to stop this at backward point. Short ball cut firmly but he doesn't let that pass
length on middle, flicked through square leg
squares him up with what looks like a legcutter. Jumps towards middle after pitching on leg and catches him on the pad as he looks to flick
length at the stumps, nudged to midwicket off the back foot
through him! Short of a length and sliding in to Chase. He's standing tall and looking to pull, but this hits him just under the back of his knee and takes the stumps
length and in at off stump. Defended on the front foot
length and curving in towards off stump. Nervously pushes at this on the front foot, gets it off the inside edge
length on off stump, defended to cover on the front foot
short of a length on off stump, punched to extra cover
length on off stump, defended to extra cover
short of a length just outside off, chopped to backward point
length on off stump, pushed to extra cover on the front foot
short of a length and turning rapidly away outside off. Beaten on the cut
short and wide outside off, cut straight to backward point
thick outside edge sprints past short third man. Googly from a length outside off, looked to drive and didn't get to the pitch of that. It's past slip
length ball fired down leg side. No bat on that. Too wide. Asghar Afghan has to give chase and pull it in at the fine leg boundary
length on middle, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
length on off stump, driven on the rise into the off side
length on leg stump, looks for the sweep and cops it on the thigh
length on middle, flicked off the back foot
length on off stump, stabbed to mid-off on the front foot
squirted to point
rocks back and slaps this to deep point
skids one through on a length, he makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
dabs it to the man coming in from point for a quick single
lofted and executed very well. Inside-out over wide long-off for six. Got to the pitch and allowed his timing to do the rest. So good to watch.

and there's the rash shot! He's committed hara-kiri by muscling this across the line to long-on. May have been better of playing the pull through midwicket. Looked to clear long-on but hit it straight down the throat of the fielder.
full on the stumps, pushed back
beaten as he looks to pull, this one bounced extra to hit him on the elbow
skiddy length ball on off, pushed to cover
wrong'un but too short, he pulls but finds deep square
on the stumps, on target, kept out
works this wide of midwicket to get off the mark
full on the stumps, defended back
drifting into middle and leg, works to deep square
he's chipped this back to the bowler. West Indies wobbling properly. This is a soft dismissal, does Pollard in flight, didn't spin much and he hit it back.
flayed on the up to deep cover
sharp turn from a length on middle, defended
defended back again
punched to long-off
gets well forward and bunts it into the off side
eased down to long-off
defended with soft hands
full on middle and leg, worked to long-on
too short, sliding away and he cuts this so well that Mujeeb at deep point had no chance even though he wasn't far from the ball
flayed to cover
punched to long-on
reverse-swept superbly past point. Was hitting against the turn but got close to the pitch to cover the line
worked wide of the bowler for a quick single
hit hard but straight to cover
worked with the angle towards deep midwicket
whipped to long-on
swept hard to deep midwicket
squirted off a thick edge to point
worked to long-on
chops the cut wide of the keeper, they jog through for a single
bunted wide of point, sensible cricket
beaten on the pull, wide called as it was above his head. Holder's asking if it's a no-ball
slower length ball angling in, tucked to the man coming in from deep square. Hard to understand why Holder would want to go for a suicidal second. Rocket throw from the deep, good grab by the keeper.
tucked to deep square to get off the mark
top-edges this pull, gets it down to fine leg. They chance a second again, somehow manage to complete it in the nick of time
he's picked the bones out of this, clubbed to deep square. Clean strike
driven uppishly to mid-off
worked across the line to midwicket
cuts straight to point
helped along to beat short fine, he'd given up
sharp turn from length outside off, defended
cuts well, sensational stop at point by Ashraf with a full-length dive
eased down to long-on
right in the slot and he's clobbered this in front of the sightscreen. Solid hit
bunted to the off side for a quick single
slower bouncer, pulled straight to short fine leg
steps out to pull, beaten.
clean hit down the ground, effortlessly done. Slower and fuller, Pooran got to the pitch and lofted it straight.
punches this full toss to long-on
sliding into the pads, worked to deep square
slips it down leg, through with the sweep very early. Gets the back of the bat, lobs wide of the keeper
drops short and punished! He rocks back and muscles this over deep midwicket to bring up his 3rd ODI fifty, a crisis knock if you can call it that
helped along past short third man. Rashid offered him pace and he used it well
late cut again, this time short third man runs across to stop that
rapped on the pad, big appeal but turned down. Height may have been in question, they get a run off the deflection, leg bye it is
bunted to short third
pulled to deep midwicket
beaten for pace, may have got a feather on the pull that deflected off the helmet and raced to the third man boundary. Excellent delivery
heaved across the line, on the bounce to deep square
right into the blockhole, dug out to long-on
full toss, right in the slot and guess what? He's heaved this straight to long-on. Oh, dear
through with the shot, beaten
clubbed to beat long-on, who was a tad wide. Rashid is a little angry with the fielder
beaten by this googly, looked to slog across the line
looks to whip it square, off the thigh pad to short fine, refuses the single
eased down to long-off
drifts in a full ball, defended
pulled to deep square leg
through with the pull, short ball way above his head though, wide called.
no pace to work with, he backs away and clobbers this straight to long-off
beaten as he looks to flat-bat this over long-on
lofted to mid-off, one bounce to Afghan
backs away and pummels that between cover and mid-off. My, my, too much power.
lofted but no timing or power and the catch has been taken at the edge of the ring at mid-off.
length on middle stump, gets behind the line and tucks it to deep square
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
big lbw appeal. Full inswinger at middle stump. He looks to flick and is struck right in front of the stumps. Might have been bat on that to save him
length and swung in at leg stump, flicked to square leg

Cottrell gets under it and rouses the crowd with a salute. Short ball climbing across off stump. He's rooted to the crease as he tries to play the pull. Ends up slicing it and Cottrell doesn't even have to leave the pitch area
full and wide outside off. Left alone
length ball at off stump, solidly defended into the covers

survives a run-out chance. Length on leg stump, poked to short fine off the inside half and he's caught ball watching as Rahmt takes off for the run. Chase can't hit the stumps at the non-striker's end
short and up at off stump. Defended to point off the back foot
length and shaping away outside off, left alone
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length and at ff stump. Defended from the crease
full outswinger just outside off, jammed to mid-off with the front leg in the leg side
beaten. Full outswinger outside off. Looks to slog that over mid-on but can't get close because the foot is well away from the pitch of it

dropped! Alzarri Joseph has put down a sitter! He can barely believe it. Short ball up at the ribs of Zazai. He tries to pull and slices it up in the leg side. Joseph gets under it from short fine and then it just pops out. Cottrell had taken the first two steps out his salute before he had to stop...
length ball swung in at leg stump. Raps him on the pad as he's cramped trying to flick this
short of a length at the stumps, defended on the back foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short ball at the ribs, hurried pull through the square leg region
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length on off stump, defended to midwicket off the back foot
pulled fine. Short ball up at his shoulder and he has a heave from underneath this. Not in control fully, but gets enough to find the fine boundary

clears square leg with another pull. Short ball cramping him at the chest area. Once again, swings from underneath. It comes off the high part of the bat and trickles towards the boundary before the fielder pulls it back in
short of a length and across off stump. Pushes away from the body, it rolls back down the pitch off the inside edge
caressed through cover point. Overpitched and wide outside off. Leans in on this and rolls his wrists to just place this to point's right
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
through cover again! Length ball goes across him. He gets on the front foot and throws his hands at this to drive on the up and into the big gap on the off side
short and wide outside off, chopped stylishly to third man
full on leg stump, looks to flick and gets a bat-pad to ping back down the pitch
length ball outside off, left alone
length in the corridor, defended on the back foot
length outside off, gets forward, opens the face and runs it down
top edge nearly carries over the third man boundary. Short of a length and getting steep in the corridor as he looks to pull this. It sails over first slip
yorker just outside off, jammed out to mid-off
short on leg stump, looks to tuck it through square leg but cops that on the thigh
short at off stump, defended on the back foot
length and in at off stump. Solidly defended into the covers
length on off stump, defended into the covers
length ball wide outside off, drives on the up to mid-off's left
short of a length and into the thigh guard as he looks to play the glance
beaten. Short of a length and rising up outside off. Has a swat at this with no feet movement and is beaten
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length on off stump, gets on his toes and clips this to mid-on's left. It is a no-ball. Zazai will have a free hit

smoked it! Wow! Some connection there! Short of a length and this one doesn't climb up or cramp him like all the ones previously. It's just sitting up in the corridor and he gets the front leg into the leg side and pummels it over the midwicket boundary from waist height
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
short of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
beaten. Length ball angled in and straightening off the surface. He wants to drive on the up on line but doesn't account for the movement
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length and turning away from middle stump. Watchfully defended
beaten. Length and turning away from off. Looks to slog and is nowhere near conncting on it
length and into the pads. Allows it to come on and tickles it fine. Short fine pulls it back in after giving chase
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length ball just outside off. Punched to extra cover on the up
overpitched just outside off, sliced straight to point off the front foot
inside edge past the keeper. Short of a length just outside off. Looks to pull on the front foot but that doesn't get up enough
short of a length outside off, cut straight to cover point
length on off stump, punched on the rise to mid-off
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, rapped on the front pad as he looks to flick
short of a length at middle stump, backs away and cuts off the under-edge to cover
short of a length and sliding into the corridor. Cut to point off the under-edge
on the bounce to long-on. Full ball on middle stump, drilled flat and very firmly to the fieder
full outside off, leans in and drives to long-off
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length and just outside off, chopped to third man
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length on off stump, punched to point's right where Hayden Walsh flings himself to the right and saves the single
length on middle stump, punched to mid-on's left
short of a length and just outside off. Looks to cut and gets a thick outside edge past first slip
length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
length on off, punched to extra cover
full on off stump, tapped back down the pitch
length on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length just outside off. Mistimed pull to short midwicket
length on middle stump, pushed to short midwicket's left
length and in at the stumps. Punched to short midwicket
short of a length just outside off, punched to point's right and a fumble there allows the run
length on middle stump, flicked to short midwicket

run-out chance has been sent upstairs. Rahmat could be out at the non-striker's end. A length ball at off, he defends to extra cover's right. Pollard swoops down on it and Rahmat has just taken off and had to turn back after making it halfway. Joseph runs back and picks up the one-bounce throw from Pollard and just manages to clip a bail out...and Rahmat is short! Huge wicket. Never a run there
full on leg stump, flicked to short fine's right
length on off stump, defended into the off side
clears long-on with ease. Full and flat at off stump, sliding nicely into Zazai's swinging arc. And when he swings in that arc, it goes a long way

this time he finds long-on! This is good bowling from Chase. Same line, same length, but it's a much slower ball this time. Dips on him a touch, grips in the pitch a touch, and does just enough to get the bat to turn in his hands as he looks for another slog over that fielder. Taken on the line
turns this gently into the leg side
rapped on the pad as this length ball straightens, umpire reckons it would've missed the stumps on height
edged and this flies between keeper and the wide slip fielder. Lucky break for Alikhil as the ball gets big on him. Off the shoulder of the bat
gets right on top of the bounce as he defends
hops back and across as he defends
floated full and across, defended from the crease
edged and four! Races between second slip and gully. Streaky but they all count
turns this off a length on middle to deep square leg
sweeps, but gets some glove on it as it races to the fine leg fence.
off the flap of the pad as the ball rolls to fine leg
lunges forward and smothers the spin
eased into the covers
defended from the crease
looks to slash on the up but misses. Beaten for pace
eases this along to square third man
squared up by the length but manages to get behind the line as he defends
beauty! Leaves him late, Alikhil beaten as he looks to run this down
heaved across the line, races to the midwicket fence
lofted over mid-off, the ball plonks near the boundary
eased down to long-on
what have you done, Asghar? He's holed out to deep midwicket. Rash shot from a senior pro. Steps out but can't get to the pitch, goes with the stroke and finds the fielder. Afghanistan crumbling
drifting into middle and leg, he tucks it wide of midwicket to get off the mark
rolls off a thickish inside edge to short fine leg
fired full into the stumps, kept out
gets well forward and smothers the spin
snorter, somehow fended away to third man. Tried to get on top of the bounce but couldn't. Alzarri working up good pace
steered away to third man
stabbed away to point again
flayed away to point
gets on top of the bounce and plays it with soft hands
right into the blockhole, kept out
tossed up on the stumps, defended as he gets a good stride in
extra bounce, gets an inside edge onto the pad
defended back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, defended back to the bowler
slider from around the wicket, he gets well forward and blocks
cut away to deep point
hostile bowling! Superb bouncer, too goo for Najib as he looks to hook. Wasn't far from his gloves
whizzes past the outside edge as he presses forward to defend. Excellent bowling. Alzarri is on song
tapped wide of cover as they scamper a single
pushed to the point region
crashed through the covers, down to the sweeper
mistimes this pull to midwicket
gets well forward and smothers this
defends this tossed up delivery with soft hands
reverse swept superbly past short third man. Lovely hands, great timing. Was playing it with the spin so the shot was a safe one
eased to the cover fielder
through the hands of the cover fielder, down to wide long-off. This was biffed
reaches out to drive this wide of point to keep strike
on the pads, tucked away to fine leg
fine and four! Are we onto something here? This is a bad ball and rightly put away. Too short and down leg, Najib uses the pace to tickle it to the fine leg boundary
thick inside edge that races to the fine leg boundary. Could've so easily chopped this onto the stumps as he looked to flat-bat this through the off side
nice and full on off, pushed to covers, looks for a single but Pollard swoops in to prevent that
ducks under this short ball on middle
another short ball, gets out of the way
flayed on the up to deep cover
cut away to deep point
drifting down leg, tucked to short fine leg
gentle tap towards short third man for a quick single
turn and bounce to rap him on the glove, lobs wide of slip. Chase can only have a wry smile, so nearly a wicket ball
driven back to the bowler
cuts and misses, didn't bounce as much as he anticipated
cuts straight to point
slower and fuller outside off, looks to smear this through cover but bails out in the end
cuts hard but straight to backward point
no timing in that stoke, mistimes a forceful drive to cover
nudges it behind square on the off side for a quick single
defended with soft hands
cuts straight to backward point
steered to deep point
too short, he rocks back and cuts to deep point
too full and drifting in, worked wide of midwicket

edged and gone! There's the big wicket. This one turns and bounces, Najib plays for the one that skids on so he's prodding down the wrong line, thin edge and well pouched. Is that the game and the series?
punched to point
slashed up and over the slip fielder, races to the third man boundary
defended into the off side with soft hands
gets well forward and defends it to the off side
right on the back foot as he taps it behind square
width and he's crashed that to the point boundary like a.............? You know it, yeah yeah that's right. TRACER BULLET
half-tracker and put away. Too short, he rocks back, holds shape and whacks it to the midwicket boundary
drives the full toss into the cover boundary. Overcompensating this time. Needs to settle into his groove pretty quickly
reaches out and drives this to sweeper cover
gets well forward and defends back
driven hard to Chase at mid-off, brief fumble but they don't steal a run
tucks this to short fine, sent back
defends this gently into the off side
dabs this to point, good work by the fielder there
slips in a length ball on middle and leg, hits him on the thigh pad as he tries to nudge it away
works this to short midwicket
gentle tap into the leg side again
punched wide of point, down to the boundary rider
drilled to long-off
too full, plays all around it and is hit on the pad. Pitched outside leg
brings out the reverse sweep and he's picked the bones out of that. This was a legbreak, so he was playing it against the turn, picked it from leg stump. Cracker of a hit
turns this gently to short fine leg
skiddy length ball, punched to cover
swept hard to deep square
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked through square leg
length on off stump, defended solidly on the back foot
past the edge. Length ball across the corridor, has a stab at it and is beaten
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
full on leg stump, flicked straight to short midwicket...where Pollard misfields
outside edge and no slip in place. Short of a length and just outside off. Gets big on him as he looks to punch through cover and it sprints past short third man
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
full on off stump, driven to extra cover
length outside off, leans in and flicks to long-on
full on leg stump, swept to short fine
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length on middle stump, past the outside edge as he closes the face. Down to third man off the thigh
length on off stump, defended to point
short of a length and wide outside off. Looks to cut but that skids under the bat
length on off stump, defended into the covers
length and just outside off, punched on the rise to sweeper's right
short of a length and just outside off, cut straight to point
slower ball at a length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
short at off stump, cut firmly to point's left where Walsh lunges low to his left to stop
short and up at the shoulder. Ducks to let it go
full on off stump, defended down the pitch
length on middle stump, flicked out to deep square
short ball up at the ribs. Takes his eyes off this and drops it into the leg side
length on middle stump, flicked to square leg off the back foot
short outside off, cut to point's left. Walsh can't hang on cleanly after getting down for it
oh deftly done. Slower ball at a length in the corridor. Allows that to come on and opens the face late to run this wide of the wicketkeeper. Third man won't get to it
length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length on middle, shuffles and flicks to deep square
pulled to deep square's right. Short and up at the chest. He's quickly behind the line and pulls firmly to get it over the boundary on the bounce
length on middle stump, defended into the off side
length on leg stump, looks to flick and is struck on the pads. Loud appeal is turned down, that pitched outside leg
slower ball at a length on off stump, punched to mid-off
full on middle stump, flicked to mid-on
length at off stump, punched into the covers off the back foot
short at off stump, chopped to third man...where Cottrell barely moves and allows them to sneak a second
short of a length just outside off, steered to third man with the angle
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
crunched! Powerful hit from Najib to bring up fifty. Full ball just outside off, shuffles and then stays tall and crunches it past Pollard to the extra cover boundary
short of a length on off stump, opens the face and runs it to point

launched over the long-on boundary! He went back to back of a length to try and cramp him, so Najib makes room by getting the front leg into the leg side. Then he just flat-bats it way over the boundary
slower short ball cut straight to Walsh at backward point. That one has stung, he's grimacing. Looks like he copped that in the stomach
length down leg side, can't get bat on it
length on middle stump, punched to mid-on
length ball wide outside off. Looks to blaze that through the off side, gets an under-edge to point
full on off stump, driven to long-off along the floor
short and just outside off. Left alone, a late decision after thinking of the late cut

edged behind! Cottrell has sparked life into his team. Short of a length and wide outside off. It's there for the cut and he's gone for it. But the timing has gone marginally wrong and he gets a thick edge to Pooran, He's crestfallen

given lbw! Oh that is a close call. Looks to me like it could have missed off stump. It's a length ball pitching on off stump and turning slightly away. Nabi gets down on his knee, a long way across with almost all stumps visible, and tries to ramp this fine. He's struck in front of off stump and the umpire reckons that is hitting. Two in two and suddenly West Indies are looking like favourites
dropped short outside off, punched to long-off
short of a length just outside off. Looks to cut and gets an inside edge onto pad and past the keeper
beaten. Length outside off. Gets forward and watches that spin past the edge
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short and wide outside off, cut aerially past point and to sweeper's left
mix-up but he survives. Short of a length at off, defended to point's right. Calls his partner through and then sends him back. Walsh can't get the throw away quickly enough
length on off stump, defended to point on the front foot
short ball at an off stump line, ducks under it
length on off stump, defended into the off side
length and into the body. Looks to flick and cops that on the body
bouncer outside off, gets under that to try and ramp it. Beaten
dropped short at middle stump, pulled straight to deep midwicket
falls short of long leg. Full ball on leg stump, gets down for the sweep and gets a top edge towards Cottrell
length outside off, pushes forward at it as it spins past the edge
full on off stump, driven to sweeper's right

beats him in flight and turns it past him. Although Rashid doesn't do himself any favours here. Looks premeditated. Short of a length and flat. He steps out and makes room but this ball has pitched outside off. That distance between batsman and ball is only going to increase from there. Easy stumping for Pooran
googly at a length outside off, defended on the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
short and just outside off. Mistimed pull to midwicet

taken at third man. This is ending fast for Afghanistan. Length ball wide outside off, probably a cutter going away. He looks to slog it and it's off the leading edge, looping out to the fielder there
full and into the corridor. Has a big heave at this and is beaten. It's narrowly past off stump
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on leg stump, shuffles and nudges it to fine leg
past the edge. Length ball just outside off, jumping up and turning away as he looks to defend
length and turning away outside off, beaten
length outside off, defended into the covers
short of a length and turning away, flicked into the midwicket region off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length and turning away outside off. Gets down and scoops this fine
slower ball at a length on off stump. Pushed down to long-on with the angle
length ball slanted into the pads. Lbw appeal turned down as he misses on the flick
length on middle stump, inside edge onto pad as he looks to flick
length and angled into the body. Has a push at this and has unwittingly managed to get it past short fine and into the boundary off the thick inside edge
short and wide outside off, beaten on the cut
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
nicely put away! A full toss on leg stump. He makes a bit of room by getting the front leg away and drills it over his partner
short of a length and ripping away outside off. Beaten on the cut
short of a length just outside off, punched to extra cover
taken at deep midwicket. That is it. The end. Walsh has a superb finish after being expensive in his opening spell. Length ball outside off, looks for the slog sweep, gets it off the toe-end
